tool_description: Quickly and efficiently retrieve high-quality data on over 535,000 food products. We provide nutrition labels, ingredients, diet compatibility, barcodes, and more. Use a barcode or product name to retrieve detailed data. Check out our website for more information.
name: Chomp - Food Nutrition Database
title: Chomp - Food Nutrition Database

api_list.name: Advanced Product Search
api_list.description: Get a list of products using any combination of our search query parameters. Retrieve barcodes, nutrition labels, ingredients, allergen warnings, trace ingredients, compatible health diets, brands, countries, categories, keywords, minerals, and vitamins for a bulk list of products.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category that the product falls under. Try "Pasta Dishes"

optional_parameters.name: nutrition
optional_parameters.description: Item from the nutrition label. Try "Zinc"

optional_parameters.name: lifestyle
optional_parameters.description: Get products that are compatible with a specific lifestyle (vegan, vegetarian, gluten free). Try "Gluten Free"

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Keyword used to describe the product. Try "Organic"

optional_parameters.name: trace
optional_parameters.description: Trace ingredient that may be found in a product. Try "Peanuts"

optional_parameters.name: palm_oil
optional_parameters.description: Ingredient made from palm oil. Try "E160a Beta Carotene"

optional_parameters.name: allergen
optional_parameters.description: Ingredient that may cause an allergic reaction. Try "Peanuts"

optional_parameters.name: mineral
optional_parameters.description: Mineral found in a product. Try "Iron"

optional_parameters.name: vitamin
optional_parameters.description: Vitamin found in a product. Try "Vitamin B12"

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand that makes the product. Try "Nestle"

optional_parameters.name: ingredient
optional_parameters.description: Ingredient found in a product. Try "Milk"

api_list.name: Get Nutrition Label Titles
api_list.description: Get a list of individual items from nutrition labels along with their total product count.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chomp.p.rapidapi.com/data/pull/nutrition.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chomp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chomp.p.rapidapi.com/data/pull/nutrition.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chomp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Individual Product by ID
api_list.description: Get an individual product using our internal product ID. Use this endpoint to retrieve barcodes, nutrition labels, ingredients, allergen warnings, trace ingredients, compatible health diets, brands, countries, categories, keywords, minerals, and vitamins for a specific product.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of a product. Try "15"

api_list.name: Individual Product by Barcode
api_list.description: Get an individual product using their barcode. Use this endpoint to retrieve barcodes, nutrition labels, ingredients, allergen warnings, trace ingredients, compatible health diets, brands, countries, categories, keywords, minerals, and vitamins for individual products.

api_list.name: Product Search by Name
api_list.description: Search for products by name. Use this endpoint to retrieve barcodes, nutrition labels, ingredients, allergen warnings, trace ingredients, compatible health diets, brands, countries, categories, keywords, minerals, and vitamins for individual products.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the product you want to retrieve. Try "Starburst"
